name: Oh Shit Boulder
description:
Settings

This is my first submitted 2.5D(3D) game that I have made. I wanted to do something fun like the player outrunning a boulder from the Crash Bandicoot game for the PS. I left the game in development as there is still some good potential for other ideas that I could do with jewels or expand it more. Amazon area? more traps?

Controls: 

  • Movement: A, S, D
  • Jump: Space bar
  • Restart or Start: R

Bugs and errors: There are a few minor bugs that I am aware of. There aren't any critical bugs (that I know) that should prevent you from playing the game

Donations / Ratings?

If you like my game and would like to see more, please support the official release by providing some feedback ratings and or donations. Feedback is gold for me.
